snippet: The Department of Homeland Security said it has received almost 180,000 applications for work permits and reprieves from deportation.
abstract: Homeland Security Dept says that in two months since Obama administration started giving reprieves from deportation and work permits to young immigrants in the country illegally, it has received almost 180,000 applications and has approved nearly 4,600.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Homeland Security said it has received almost 180,000 applications for work permits and reprieves from deportation.
